tool_description: Filter and sort your JSON data.
title: JSON Sort and Filter

api_list.name: change json orientation
api_list.description: This endpoint can be used to change the json orientation.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://json-sort-and-filter.p.rapidapi.com/json"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "json-sort-and-filter.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: root__get
api_list.code:
